name: list_frmr_documents
description: List available FRMR JSON documents and metadata. This is usually the first tool to call to discover what FedRAMP data is available.

name: get_frmr_document
description: Retrieve a FRMR document with metadata, raw JSON, and summary.

arguments.name: type
arguments.desc: Document type (KSI, MAS, VDR, SCN, FRD, ADS)

name: list_versions
description: List detected FRMR versions and associated metadata from documents.

name: list_ksi
description: List individual KSI requirement entries with optional filters.

name: get_ksi
description: Retrieve a single KSI entry by id.

name: filter_by_impact
description: Filter Key Security Indicators by impact level (low, moderate, high).

arguments.name: impact
arguments.desc: Impact level: low, moderate, or high

name: get_theme_summary
description: Get comprehensive guidance for a KSI theme with indicators, impact breakdown, and related docs.

arguments.name: theme
arguments.desc: Theme code: AFR, CED, CMT, CNA, IAM, INR, MLA, PIY, RPL, SVC, TPR

name: get_evidence_examples
description: Get suggested evidence examples for KSI compliance (community suggestions, not official FedRAMP guidance).

arguments.name: id
arguments.desc: Get evidence for specific KSI ID

name: list_controls
description: Return flattened control mappings across FRMR sets.

arguments.name: family
arguments.desc: Filter by control family (e.g., AC, SC)

name: get_control_requirements
description: Get all FedRAMP requirements mapped to a specific NIST control.

arguments.name: control
arguments.desc: NIST control ID (e.g., AC-2, SC-13, IA-5)

name: analyze_control_coverage
description: Analyze which NIST control families have FedRAMP requirements with coverage report.

name: search_markdown
description: Full-text search across FedRAMP markdown documentation and guidance.

name: read_markdown
description: Read a markdown file and return its contents and digest.

name: search_definitions
description: Search FedRAMP definitions (FRD document) by term.

name: get_requirement_by_id
description: Get any FedRAMP requirement by its ID (KSI-*, FRR-*, FRD-*).

name: diff_frmr
description: Compute a structured diff between two FRMR documents by identifier.

arguments.name: id_key
arguments.desc: Key to use for matching items

name: grep_controls_in_markdown
description: Search markdown files for occurrences of a control identifier.

name: get_significant_change_guidance
description: Aggregate markdown sections and FRMR references related to Significant Change.

name: health_check
description: Verify the index is ready. Returns indexed file count, repo path, commit info, and auto-update settings.

name: update_repository
description: Force update the cached FedRAMP docs repository to get the latest data from GitHub.
